page.title: 06WORTH SCHOOL AND ABBEY
page.content: The 19th century house and 500acres were bought from{Lord Cowdray's}family in 1933. It was bought by the{Downside monks. The school began as a prep school for the Downside senior school. In 1959 the school was opened for boys over 13 the change being completed to 13-18s senior school in 1964. It then had 165 boys. The prep school then became known as the junior house of the senior school. The{Abbey}since has passed through the normal stages of {Benedictine growth.}It was a dependent priory fron 1933-1957 then an independent priory and since 1965 an Abbey in it's own right. It is one of 14 independent houses which comprise the{English Benedictine}congregation Most of the monks teach full time, or are involved in administration, forestry or pottery.Individual monks get involved in other things.
